title: Youth receives bullet injuries in Savar; four arrested
body: A man was received bullet injuries in a reported gun attack by miscreants at Palashbari in Ashulia of Savar on Wednesday night. The victim was identified as Simanto Hossain, a worker of Gildan Garment in Baipail area of Ashulia. Jalal Uddin, officer-in-charge of Dhaka DB, said that the miscreants opened fire on Shimanto over a trifling matter on Wednesday night, leaving him injured. Police also arrested four people — Abdul Mannan Patowari, Monowar Hossain Titu, Al Amin Swapan and Julhas Mia — over their suspected involvement in the attack from the area on Wednesday night. Police also recovered arms and ammunition from them.
